name: Need for Speed: Rivals - Complete Edition
name_original: Need for Speed: Rivals - Complete Edition
description:
Need for Speed: Rivals - Complete Edition is a racing-arcade game developed by Ghost Games. It came out on 21-10-2014. Electronic Arts published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Need for Speed: Rivals - Complete Edition on PlayStation 4, PC and PlayStation 3. The game is sold via PlayStation Store and Xbox Store.
